With just your webcam and this software you forget your password, just put your face in front of the computer, you will have access to your PC or Laptop. KeyLemon provides a new experience to access your computer. Instead of entering your password, you just need to smile at the webcam and KeyLemon credited. In these times, we are constantly interacting with computers and the internet. We have to create many personal accounts in order to access computers and Web services such as social networks, blogs, forums, e-mail accounts or online games. Apart from the bad time because of forgotten passwords, and therefore use the recovery function them, repeatedly enter passwords becomes tedious as a time consuming process. Moreover, what if you forget to lock your computer before you go for coffee? Password protection is a security procedure at once. After the accession process, nothing ensures that even the right person behind the computer, accessing the data or correct services. To resolve this problem KeyLemon offers access solutions based on biometric personal authentication. The biometric authentication technology behind KeyLemon products are the result of 10 years of research. Compatibility with Win XP, Vista and also in Windows 7 (only for 32 bits) Easy to use and can be configured to lock the system in a given amount of time, as Webcam.
